issue.title: [Python] creating schema with invalid paramaters causes segmanetation fault
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3889](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3889). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A segmentation fault occurs when executing the following:

`import pyarrow`
`s = pyarrow.schema([None])`
`print(s)`
